hadiths.text: This tradition has also been reported by Shu’bah through a different chain of narrators. This version adds:Bless Muhammad and Muhammad’s family as Thou didst bless Abraham

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بَعْدَ التَّشَهُّدِ
chapter.eng-name: Sending Salat Upon The Prophet (ﷺ) After The Tashah-hud
